title: Can I get the NEHU previous questions from the markets? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think you will get from the market, but I'm sure you would get from the concerns department, or find out the person who is appearing in last or previous years. BUT, if you go to concerns department then you get from any year, department worker are good and honest people, they will not hesitate to give You, “concerns department mean any subject which you're going to appear, suppose you're going for Geography go and request to the geography department. Best of luck friend.
I don't know because l never tried to find it in market but usually the professors collect questions and l got mostly from my teachers so you can ask from them and see if they collect.
